H0.text: Microwaves are the kind of waves used in radar guns.

H1.text: X-rays are the kind of waves used in radar guns.

H2.text: WIFI is the type of waves used in radar guns.

H3.text: Radio waves are used in radar guns.

A4.text: Modern radar speed guns normally operate at X, K, Ka, and (in Europe) Ku bands.

A5.text: Radar speed guns, like other types of radar, consist of a radio transmitter and receiver.

A6.text: Microwaves are the main wavelengths used in radar, and are used for satellite communication, and wireless networking technologies such as Wiâ€‘Fi.
